tool.name: ivar removereads
tool.description: Remove reads from trimmed BAM file
tool.command: ln -s '$input_bam' sorted.bam && ln -s '$primer_index' primers.txt && ln -s '$input_bed' bed.bed && ivar removereads -i sorted.bam -p removed_reads.bam -t primers.txt -b bed.bed

param.name: input_bam
param.label: Bam file
param.help: Aligned reads, to trim primers and quality

param.name: primer_index
param.label: Text file with primer indices separated by spaces
param.help: This is the output of getmasked command

param.name: input_bed
param.label: BED file with primer sequences and positions
